title: Watch TikTok's top videos of 2021
description: TikTok released its top trends list of 2021, and it's full of drones, bones, and joyful tones. These are the most popular TikToks in the US this year.

title: Facebook sued for $150 billion over violence against Rohingya in Myanmar
description: Rohingya refugees are suing Facebook over its own admitted failure to stop the spread of hate speech that contributed to violence in Myanmar.

title: Bob Costas shares personal story on Beijing's playbook of repressing criticism
description: Veteran American sports commentator Bob Costas joins CNN's Erin Burnett to discuss the Biden administration's decision to partially boycott the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics.
